member.name: MOVE_FILE_DATA
member.summary: Contains input data for the FSCTL_MOVE_FILEcontrol code.

summary.para: A handle to the file to be moved.
To retrieve a handle to a file, use.
If the file is encrypted, the handle must have the FILE_READ_DATA,FILE_WRITE_DATA, FILE_APPEND_DATA, orFILE_EXECUTE access right. For more information, seeFile Security and Access Rights.

member.name: MOVE_FILE_DATA.StartingVcn
member.summary: A VCN (cluster number relative to the beginning of a file) of the first cluster to be moved.

member.name: MOVE_FILE_DATA.StartingLcn
member.summary: An LCN (cluster number on a volume) to which the VCN is to be moved.

member.name: MOVE_FILE_DATA.ClusterCount
member.summary: The count of clusters to be moved.
